mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve image optimization and use a mobile-first design for smoother navigation on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images, enable caching, and minimize JavaScript to speed up the site.
seoOptimizationTip: Add meta descriptions and structured data (schema markup) to improve search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Make the navigation bar sticky to improve access to important sections while scrolling.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing the number of steps and required fields for a faster, smoother user experience.
tips: Enhance accessibility by adding alternative text for images.
Add a clear call-to-action button on the homepage for easy navigation to booking pages.
